alert.note: Alert for Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:19PM EST until December 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Western Essex County. In Vermont, Eastern Addison, Eastern Rutland and Western Windsor Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow could lead to power outages, especially above 1500 ft.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
